comment: the word `Love` covers a multitude of sins.

diff.*:
Line 1: Line 1:  
: ''For the 1960s band, see [[Love (band)]]. The term is also used in [[Tennis#History of tennis|tennis]].''
 
: ''For the 1960s band, see [[Love (band)]]. The term is also used in [[Tennis#History of tennis|tennis]].''
    −
'''Love''' is an intense feeling of [[affection]], an [[emotion]] or emotional state. It is also a feeling of attraction towards a person in a [[Romance|romantic]] and/or [[physical attraction|physical]] sense. This is sometimes called romantic love to distinguish it from affection between family members or friends or between human beings and their pets. Love is also a deep liking for something (anything). Special love is a special [[affection]] for someone or something, a [[feeling]] or [[emotion]]. Unhealthy love is the sharing or desire to share something which would not be good for you or the object of your desire.
+
'''Love''' is a very vague word in [[English]].It can mean an intense feeling of [[affection]], an [[emotion]] or emotional state.It can mean to act in a way which considers someone else`s needs as more important than your own. It can also be used to describe a feeling of attraction towards a person in a [[Romance|romantic]] and/or [[physical attraction|physical]] sense. This is sometimes called romantic love to distinguish it from affection between family members or friends or between human beings and their pets. Love is also a deep liking for something (anything). Special love is a special [[affection]] for someone or something, a [[feeling]] or [[emotion]]. Unhealthy love is the sharing or desire to share something which would not be good for you or the object of your desire.
     
{{emotion}}
 
{{emotion}}
